Kalyan Kumar M wrote:

> How can I test asynchronous calls using JUnit?

> Can I use JUnit for such a scenario? If 'Yes', how? If 'No', what
> other frameworks are there to be able to test such scenarios.

If you can write a Java client using threads that blocks waiting for the 
response from your server, then you can do that in JUnit as well. I am 
not a threading expert, so I defer to someone else to help with the details.

I do have a big question, though: what are you testing--the client or 
the server?
